desc: Control Technologies is a leading engineering consultancy, specialising in real-time control and monitoring solutions, with over a decade of experience working in industries such as EVs, energy storage and off-highway. We take your ideas and turn them into reality using proven engineering techniques.

layout.text: We are exhibiting at the Battery Cells and Systems Expo 2022!
Birmingham NEC Arena - 29th & 30th June 2022 - Come and visit us at Stand: 17-627
